entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Web Development #8144
  • Set dark icons for lightTheme #8143
  • Canvas does not work AT ALL outside of constructor #8142
  • [Android] Resetting App.Current.MainPage doesn't show the new page. #8141
  • .NET MAUI Button on Android #8139
  • MacOS And Windows frame error #8138
  • [Windows] List view is flickered while Itemsource is dynamically updated #8137
  • [Android] CollectionView and other control's visibility do not update from Binding #8135
  • App cant run on iOS, but normal on mac and android simulator. #8132

Closed

  • ANDROID Shell.Current.GoToAsync doesn't work if Shell.PresentationMode="ModalAnimated" #8038
  • Image with different format not working In IOS #8036
  • Can't find my app resource file with iOS #7722
  • Bug with Hot Reload : Different layout screen without applying any modification to it #7603

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Revert recent changes to fix Layout issues #8136
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, fatal, 6.0-sr3
  • [Tizen] Update default Shell Flyout behavior #8134
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Tizen] Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport #8133
    area/layout 🔲, platform/tizen

Merged

  • Update the conditions for signing to include net7 #8140
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update the Windows App SDK #8107
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0-sr2
  • Explicitly set bounds for iOS ScrollView content holder #8002
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr2
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8057
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 #8054
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Fix Modal Navigation with Shell #8117
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fix for #5523 MauiWebView not loading local files on Windows #7672
    platform/windows 🪟, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix issue rendering Brushes binding GradientStop colors #7719
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️, control-button, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix Border Background not changed to Brush once we set the Gradient #7926
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, 6.0-sr3
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Alert on modal page #7898
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Set the correct font using IsPassword property on Entry #8015
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix crash using ContentViews inside CollectionView #8051
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, fatal, 6.0-sr3
  • Remove the extra lines in the error message for better viewing #8069
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
